Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at 75th/Racine
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 76th, Loomis, 74th, and Racine, due to street blockage near 75th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 76th, Loomis, 74th, and Racine ,due to street blockage near 75th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Racine
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, and continue across 74th to Racine, due to street blockage near 75th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 74th, and continue across 74th to Racine, due to street blockage near 75th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
